items.sentence: I don\'t want to be late for my first class.
I don\'t want to buy anything in this store.
Since Tom was sick, he didn\'t go to school.

Tom is planting a palm tree in his backyard.
Tom is quite different from what I expected.
Tom is really serious about learning French.
Tom is rich enough to buy whatever he wants.
Tom shouldn\'t say things like that to Mary.
I don\'t really want to talk about this now.
I don\'t think Tom would do that on purpose.
Tom said he was concerned about the problem.

I\'m fed up with the way Tom\'s been acting.
I appreciate everything you\'ve done for us.

I assume that Tom doesn\'t know how to swim.
